EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Unified EMEA Invite 5-10-17
EmailTemplate.subject: VIP Invitation - Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Pivotal partners with its clients to enable their digital transformation through technology, agile development, and analytics. Join us for the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=noram-unified-pair_q2-317]]>, where you will learn how to develop and implement successful analytics initiatives through a step-by-step strategy session and guided, hands-on exercises.
Register Now <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=noram-unified-pair_q2-317]]> to Attend this Complimentary, Day-Long Event in one of the following Cities:
London - May 16 Milan - May 25 Munich - July 4 <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/munich?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-unified-pair_q2-317]]>
The morning session will cover:
- Steps to develop and implement your analytics strategy and roadmap - Best practices for risk and fraud management, cyber security and IoT - Migrating new projects and legacy production data warehouses to the cloud
The afternoon hands-on workshop will cover:
- Analytics Best Practices exercise guided by a Pivotal data science expert - Key analytical models, from machine learning to geospatial and graph
The event is designed for:
- Business leaders and marketers who leverage data to compete and win - Enterprise architects, IT, data warehousing, and BI professionals - Data scientists, business analysts, statisticians, data engineers, and hackers
REGISTER NOW <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=noram-unified-pair_q2-317]]>
If you have any questions, please email Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[email:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
Thank you in advance for joining us, The Pivotal Team
